chapters.title: Recording an Obituary
chapters.description: The narrator states their intention to record their obituary to ease the burden on their family and provide a guide for those writing it.

chapters.title: Funeral Details Announced
chapters.description: Lindy transitions to detailing funeral arrangements, including prayers, burial, and cremation.

chapters.title: Starting a Career in Electrical Work
chapters.description: Lindy begins describing his early work experience on the farm and in the electrical field.

chapters.title: Business Ventures Listed
chapters.description: Lindy begins listing his various business ventures and affiliations, starting with Tompkins Electric.

chapters.title: Company Sale and Family History
chapters.description: Lindy transitions to discussing the history of Achen Construction Company, its sale, and its continued operation.

chapters.title: Mail Order Poetry Catalogs and Childhood Memories
chapters.description: Lindy discusses receiving catalogs of poetry from a mail-order house.

chapters.title: History of Property Sale
chapters.description: Lindy introduces a historical account of selling property and company shares.

summary: A personal memoir recording covering family memories and life stories.

stories.title: Organizational Memberships
stories.description: Lindy begins listing various organizations he was a member of.

stories.title: Family and Mortality
stories.description: Lindy shifts to discussing his sister and reflecting on his life's accomplishments.

stories.title: Sprinkler System Discussion
stories.description: Lindy abruptly changes the subject to a discussion about a sprinkler system and water pressure.

stories.title: Listening to Recordings and Date/Time
stories.description: Lindy states the date as July 1st, 1989 and comments on the beautiful weather.
